data.title: Historic Music Library : 78s We Buy
data.meta_description: Although the 78s we buy are over 50 years old, only CERTAIN 78 RPM RECORDS ARE OF INTEREST TO US. In fact most 78s have little, if any, value to us but WE WILL PAY TOP DOLLAR to purchase the types of Vintage Shellac, Victrola or 78 RPM Records we want
data.text:
78s We Buy

There are BILLIONS of antique records out there. We are only interested in very specific ones.. no BIG BAND, no CLASSICAL, no SHOW MUSIC, no ALBUM SETS and no 1940s-50s records.

Only contact us AFTER you have looked at our gallery of 78 RPM LABELS WE BUY and 78 RPM LABELS WE DONT BUY.

We get 100's of calls a day and want to be sure we are not wasting each other's time.

If you think you have the antique records we buy, email us a list that includes LABEL NAME, ARTIST and CATALOG NUMBER.

LAUNCH ANATOMY OF 78 RPM RECORD LABELS to help you find this info.

You can also use our downloadable 78 RPM RECORD INFO FORM (PDF).

If you want to SELL YOUR OLD 78s and have a COLLECTION or ACCUMULATION of VINTAGE 78 RPM RECORDS from your ATTIC, or BASEMENT, from AUCTIONS or the inside of your OLD VICTROLA, from your PARENTS or GRANDPARENTS and want GREAT PRICES for them, you've come to the right place.

Why Sell To JOE LAURO's

OLD 78s ?
